name: Claude Data
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's data knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's data knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-data (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2. Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: data-context-extractor, data-exploration, data-validation, data-visualization, interactive-dashboard-builder, sql-queries, statistical-analysis. Rules: analyze.md, build-dashboard.md, create-viz.md, explore-data.md, validate.md, write-query.md.
